text: Curuapira apyama is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Martins and Galileo in 2005. It is known from Bolivia.BioLib.cz - Curuapira apyama. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 2005
title: Curuapira apyama
